item.description: Complete - Rescue; INC#1085; 03:58PM; 8367 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ov1jsE; #BeverlyGrove; LAFD Firefighters, including an LAFD Urban Search and Rescue team specially trained, equipped and certified to manage confined space rescues, have utilized a high-point rope system with wrist straps to quickly and safely rescue the conscious and alert adult male, who was trapped feet-first, eleven feet from the rooftop, in an approximately 18" metal ventilation shaft at a vacant two story restaurant. He claimed he had been there for as much as 24 hours. The man, who has no visible injuries, was medically evaluated by LAFD Paramedic. He declined ambulance transportation, and will be interviewed by LAPD Wilshire Division (Incident #2674) Officers to determine his affiliation if any with the site, as well as the circumstances under which he entered the ventilation shaft.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 E203 E227 E261 E288 E41 E89 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA41 RA61 RA827 RA88 T27 T3 T61 T88 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#1085; 03:02PM; 8367 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ov1jsE; #BeverlyGrove; PRELIM: Conscious and alert adult male (unknown age / site affiliation / circumstances) trapped feet-first (an unknown distance deep) in an 18" ventilation shaft at a two story restaurant. LAFD Firefighters, including those specially trained and equipped in Urban Search and Rescue have begun efforts to safely free the man.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 E203 E227 E41 E89 EM11 HR3 RA41 RA827 RA88 T27 T3 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0231; 05:37AM; 468 N Tigertail Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oLAdh3; #Brentwood; 42 Firefighters took 69 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy flames that swept through the garage and consumed the attic, heavily damaging the 2,537 square-foot one story home, built in 1938. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC9 E19 E237 E269 E292 E59 E71 E88 RA19 RA837 T37 T69 T92; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0231; 04:28AM; 468 N Tigertail Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oLAdh3; #Brentwood; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations on a one story home that had heavy fire in an attached garage on arrival. Fire extended into the attic, leading to structural compromise.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E237 E269 E292 E59 E71 RA19 RA837 T37 T69 T92; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1257; 06:47PM; 5967 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J3ALrM; #VermontSlauson; Address Confirmed. 52 Firefighters took just 30 minutes to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire in a vacant 50' x 200' one-story commercial building that was well involved with fire on their arrival, sparing a nearby home on 60th Street from any fire damage. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E215 E233 E266 E29 E33 E66 EA1 RA246 RA846 SQ21 T15 T33 T66; CH7; 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1257; 06:17PM; 5967 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J3ALrM; #VermontSlauson; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations on arrival at a vacant 50' x 200' one-story commercial building well involved with fire, nearby home on 60th Street threatened by flames.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 E14 E15 E215 E233 E266 E29 E33 E66 RA246 RA846 SQ21 T15 T33 T66; CH7; 15; Brian Humphrey

Update Multi-Patient Incident; INC#1050; 05:00PM; 560 N Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gexo3U; #SanPedro; At least seven injured civilians (4 Male 3 Female, no ages available ) have been taken to area hospitals by LAFD Paramedics following gunfire at or near a car show at Peck Park. At least three of the patients are confirmed to have sustained gunshot injury, including one Male and one Female, both transported in Critical condition. There are no other patients remaining at scene. The incident circumstances, patient demographics, affiliation and precise nature of each patient's injuries have yet to be confirmed. Media Inquiries: LAPD Harbor Division (Incident #2513).; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E210 E248 E36 E38 E85 EM1 EM11 EM13 PI1 RA10 RA101 RA246 RA264 RA36 RA38 RA57 RA65 RA66 RA848 RA85 RA857 RA864 T10 T48 TL1 TL2; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Incident; INC#1050; 03:51PM; 560 N Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gexo3U; #SanPedro; PRELIM: At least four civilians are reported to be injured, possibly related to gunfire heard at or near a car show at Peck Park. The circumstances, total number of patients and precise nature of their injuries has yet to be confirmed. Media Inquiries: LAPD Harbor Division (Incident #2513).; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E248 E36 EM11 EM13 RA101 RA264 RA36 RA38 RA57 RA65 RA848 RA857 RA864 T48; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0887; 03:00PM; Topanga State Park; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BeiCpa; #SantaMonicaMountains; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to (another) injured hiker in the vicinity of the 1:48 PM incident, an adult female (unknown if affiliated with earlier 7 member group) who sustained facial trauma in a ground level fall on/near a remote section of the Los Liones Trail. As LAFD ground crews continue to hike toward the patient, a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter has lowered a Flight Paramedic to medically assess and stabilize her in preparation for being hoisted with the rescuer aboard the hovering LAFD aircraft for in-flight care during direct air transportation to an area hospital.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC9 BP23 E23 E269 E90 H0E H2 H5 HA2 HA5 RA23 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0949; 02:51PM; 17224 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PvZszF; #HarborGateway; Address *Corrected* from 172nd Street to 17224 South Hoover Street. 34 LAFD Firefighters took just 24 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames in a 2,756 square foot two-story home, preventing flames from extending to a nearby structure. No injury. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 79; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E233 E264 E285 E64 E79 RA64 RA79 RA857 T33 T64 T85; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey
